text: Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhaheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhaheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 34. Should any bhikkhunī not attend to her ailing student nor make an effort to have her attended to, it is to be confessed.  [See Cv.VIII.12.2]
